mutants.code:
import re

def snake_case(s):
    s = re.sub('', '', s)
    s = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', s)
    s = s.replace(' ', '_').lower()
    return s

import re

def snake_case(s):
    s = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9\\s]', 'MUTATED', s)
    s = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', s)
    s = s.replace(' ', '_').lower()
    return s

import re

def snake_case(s):
    s = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9\\s]', '', s)
    s = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', s)
    s = s.replace(' ', '').lower()
    return s
